argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | coe1add.y | |- Y = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | coe1add.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | coe1add.p | |- .+b = ( +g ` Y ) |
| 4 |  | coe1add.q | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_coe1add | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( coe1 ` ( F .+b G ) ) = ( ( coe1 ` F ) oF .+ ( coe1 ` G ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( coe1 ` ( F .+b G ) ) = ( ( coe1 ` F ) oF .+ ( coe1 ` G ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( F .+b G ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) oF .+ ( coe1 ` G ) ) ` X ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( coe1 ` F ) = ( coe1 ` F ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 10 | 8, 2, 1, 9 | #P_coe1f | |- ( F e. B -> ( coe1 ` F ) : NN0 --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( coe1 ` F ) : NN0 --> ( Base ` R ) -> ( coe1 ` F ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. B -> ( coe1 ` F ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( coe1 ` F ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( coe1 ` F ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( coe1 ` G ) = ( coe1 ` G ) |
| 16 | 15, 2, 1, 9 | #P_coe1f | |- ( G e. B -> ( coe1 ` G ) : NN0 --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( coe1 ` G ) : NN0 --> ( Base ` R ) -> ( coe1 ` G ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. B -> ( coe1 ` G ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( coe1 ` G ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( coe1 ` G ) Fn NN0 ) |
| 21 |  | #P_nn0ex | |- NN0 e. _V |
| 22 | 21 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> NN0 e. _V ) |
| 23 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> X e. NN0 ) |
| 24 |  | #P_fnfvof | |- ( ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) Fn NN0 /\ ( coe1 ` G ) Fn NN0 ) /\ ( NN0 e. _V /\ X e. NN0 ) ) -> ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) oF .+ ( coe1 ` G ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` X ) .+ ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 25 | 14, 20, 22, 23, 24 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) oF .+ ( coe1 ` G ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` X ) .+ ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` X ) ) ) |
| 26 | 7, 25 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( F .+b G ) ) ` X ) = ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` X ) .+ ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` X ) ) ) |
